command.model.hint1: Type {green}!model <@random/model name> <all/ct/t> {default}to change your model. (@random for random models, recommend using {green}!models{default})
command.model.success: %pmc_prefix%{green}Your model on {0} will be set after next spawn.
command.model.cooldown: %pmc_prefix%{red}You need to wait for a while before changing model.
command.resetmodel.success: %pmc_prefix%{green}Your model will be reseted from next spawn.
command.modeladmin.hint: {green}!modeladmin [all/steamid] reset [all/ct/t] {default}Reset player's model. {green}!modeladmin [all/steamid] set [all/ct/t] [model index] {default}Set player's model. {green}!modeladmin [steamid] check {default}Check if player's model is not allowed to have, if not then reset it. {green}!modeladmin reload {default}Reload the config.
model.wrongteam: %pmc_prefix%{red}You can't apply {default} {0}{red} model to this side.
model.nopermission: %pmc_prefix%{red}You don't have the permission for this model.
model.invalidreseted: %pmc_prefix%{red}Your model for {0} is invalid and it have been reseted.
model.nochangepermission: %pmc_prefix%{red}You don't have the permission to change your model.
